fix.after:
match cmd:
    case "--help" | "-h":
        printHelp()
    case "build":
        status = True
        if len(sys.argv) == 3 and sys.argv[2] == "Debug":
            status &= build("Debug")
        else:
            status &= build("Release")
        if not status:
            sys.exit(-1)
    case "run":
        if len(sys.argv) < 3:
            print("please input a target to run, available targets are:")
            print(targets)
            sys.exit(0)
        runTarget(sys.argv[2])
    case "clean":
        clean()
    case _:
        print("unknown option " + cmd)
        printHelp()
